mapper.select: SELECT gt.group_tour_id AS id, gt.title AS name, gt.description, gt.price, gt.discounted_price AS discountedPrice, gt.duration, gt.location, gt.departure_info AS departureInfo, gt.rating, gt.image_url AS coverImage, gt.banner_image AS bannerImage, gt.category FROM group_tours gt LEFT JOIN ( SELECT group_tour_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating, COUNT(*) as review_count FROM reviews WHERE group_tour_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY group_tour_id ) rv ON gt.group_tour_id = rv.group_tour_id WHERE gt.show_on_user_site = 1 AND gt.is_active = 1 ORDER BY gt.rating DESC, rv.review_count DESC, gt.group_tour_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT gt.group_tour_id AS id, gt.title AS name, gt.description, gt.price, gt.discounted_price AS discountedPrice, gt.duration, gt.location, gt.departure_info AS departureInfo, gt.rating, gt.image_url AS coverImage, gt.banner_image AS bannerImage, gt.category FROM group_tours gt WHERE gt.show_on_user_site = 1 AND gt.is_active = 1 ORDER BY gt.group_tour_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
